meanings.definition: The quality of being lively and full of energy.
meanings.sent1: Her sprightliness was evident as she danced around the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's sprightliness was contagious, bringing smiles to everyone around.
meanings.sent3: The sprightliness of the squirrel as it darted up the tree was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The sprightliness of the children playing in the park was like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: His sprightliness on the basketball court made him a formidable opponent.

meanings.definition: The state of being animated or vivacious.
meanings.sent1: The sprightliness of her laughter filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent2: The actor's sprightliness on stage captivated the audience's attention.
meanings.sent3: The sprightliness of the old cat chasing a toy mouse was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The sprightliness of the river as it flowed through the valley was a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The sprightliness of the flowers in the garden brought a sense of joy to all who passed by.
